com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.v4.core

Class RoutineContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.v4.core.RoutineContext

  • public abstract class RoutineContext
extends Object
    Class representing an Android routine context (like activities or fragments).

    No strong reference to the wrapped objects will be retained by this class implementations. So, it is up to the caller to ensure that they are not garbage collected before time.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 08/07/15.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RoutineContext contextFrom(Fragment fragment)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment.
      static RoutineContext contextFrom(FragmentActivity activity)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified activity.
      static RoutineContext contextFrom(FragmentActivity activity, Context context)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified activity, with the specified instance as base context.
      In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified context must be static.
      static RoutineContext contextFrom(Fragment fragment, Context context)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment, with the specified instance as base context.
      In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified context must be static.
      abstract Object getComponent()
      Returns the wrapped component.
      abstract Context getLoaderContext()
      Returns the loader context.
      abstract LoaderManager getLoaderManager()
      Returns the loader manager of the specific component.

      • contextFrom

        @Nonnull
public static RoutineContext contextFrom(@Nonnull
                                 Fragment fragment,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 Context context)
        Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment, with the specified instance as base context.
        In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified context must be static.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment instance.
        context - the context used to get the application one.
        Returns:
        the routine context.
